tasks.label: auto run current file
args: ext="${fileExtname}"; root="${workspaceFolder}"; if [ -d "$root/Csharp" ] && [ -f "$root/Csharp/GuiApp/GuiApp.csproj" ]; then root="$root/Csharp"; fi; if [ "$ext" = ".cpp" ]; then /opt/homebrew/bin/g++ -std=c++26 -fdiagnostics-color=always -g -o "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" "${file}" && "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; elif [ "$ext" = ".py" ]; then /opt/homebrew/bin/python3 "${file}"; elif [ "$ext" = ".js" ]; then node "${file}"; elif [ "$ext" = ".java" ]; then javac "${file}" && cd "${fileDirname}" && java "${fileBasenameNoExtension}"; elif [ "$ext" = ".cs" ] || [ "$ext" = ".axaml" ]; then cd "$root" && dotnet run --project GuiApp/GuiApp.csproj; else echo Unsupported file type: $ext; fi

tasks.label: build-csharp
args: root="${workspaceFolder}"; if [ -d "$root/Csharp" ] && [ -f "$root/Csharp/GuiApp/GuiApp.csproj" ]; then root="$root/Csharp"; fi; cd "$root" && dotnet build GuiApp/GuiApp.csproj
